title: Facebook : global penetration rage as of June 2017 , by region
summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of population using Facebook in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of population using Facebook is appeared to be the highest at Country North America and lowest at Country Africa.
There is a difference of 59.7 between the maximum Country North America and minimum Country Africa.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of population using Facebook in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Share of population using Facebook 72.4 is found at Country North America and the minimum is found at Africa where Share of population using Facebook is 12.7.

The Country North America has the highest Share of population using Facebook, followed by , and Oceania / Australia. Down to the Country Africa which is the lowest.
